```{r}
library(stringr)
library(lubridate)
民國年月<-c("099/01","099/02","099/03")

# 1
str_c("1",民國年月,"/01")->民國年月

# 2
lubridate::ymd(民國年月) -> 民國年月

# 3
民國年月 + years(911)
```


```{r}
民國年月<-c("099/01","099/02","099/03")

library(dplyr)
# 1
民國年月 %>% 
  str_c("1", . ,"/01") %>%
  ymd %>%
  { . + years(911) }
```

#因為有","所以數值出現NA，故做修正
```{r}
library(stringr)
collegeData %>%
  mutate( #將所有逗號拿掉
    一年級男生=str_replace(一年級男生,",",""),
    一年級女生=str_replace(一年級女生,",","")
    ) %>%
  mutate( #將字串轉成數值
   一年級男生=as.numeric(一年級男生),
   一年級女生=as.numeric(一年級女生) 
  ) -> collegeData3
```

#locale setting
```{r}
library(readr)
cl<-locale(grouping_mark = ",") # 創造cl來描述千分位符號使用","的習慣場景
collegeData %>% 
  mutate(
    `日間∕進修別`=as.factor(`日間∕進修別`),
    等級別=as.factor(等級別),
    一年級男生=parse_number(一年級男生,na=c("","NA","-"),locale=cl),
    一年級女生=parse_number(一年級女生,na=c("","NA","-"),locale=cl)
  ) -> collegeData4
```
#Use problems() to find NAs
```{r}
problems(collegeData4$一年級男生)
```

#以二年級生做練習
```{r}
library(readr)
cl<-locale(grouping_mark = ",") # 創造cl來描述千分位符號使用","的習慣場景
collegeData4 %>% 
  mutate(
    `日間∕進修別`=as.factor(`日間∕進修別`),
    等級別=as.factor(等級別),
    二年級男生=parse_number(二年級男生,na=c("","NA","-"),locale=cl),
    二年級女生=parse_number(二年級女生,na=c("","NA","-"),locale=cl)
  ) -> collegeData4
```

```{r}
collegeData %>% 
  mutate(
    `日間∕進修別`=as.factor(`日間∕進修別`),
    等級別=as.factor(等級別),
    一年級男生=parse_number(一年級男生,na=c("","NA","-"),locale=cl),
    一年級女生=parse_number(一年級女生,na=c("","NA","-"),locale=cl)
  ) -> collegeData4

collegeData4 %>%
  mutate(
    一年級男生每千人=一年級男生/1000,
    一年級女生每千人=一年級女生/1000
    ) -> collegeData5
```

parse_number(.,locale=cl)
```{r}
college1stYearData %>%
  mutate_all(
    funs(
      parse_number(.,na=c("","NA","-"),locale=cl)
    )
  ) ->college1stYearDataNumeric
 head(college1stYearDataNumeric)
```

```{r}
college1stYearDataNumeric %>%

    funs(

      每千人=./1000
    )
  ) -> college1stYearDataNumeric
 college1stYearDataNumeric %>% colnames
```
